docs.snippet: The ferry tragedy revealed an underlying sense of self-doubt.
docs.lead_paragraph: The ferry tragedy revealed an underlying sense of self-doubt.
docs.abstract: Editorial notes South Korean ferry disaster has prompted a period of self-examination in country, as Pres Park Geun-hye seeks to break culture of collusive ties between businesses and government regulators; holds tragedy will not have been totally in vain if it prompts meaningful change from the top of the government on down.

docs.snippet: South Korea's most wanted man, whose heavily decomposed body was found in an orchard last month, had evaded arrest by hiding behind an upstairs wall of a wooden cabin, with suitcases of cash at hand, prosecutors said on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korea's most wanted man, whose heavily decomposed body was found in an orchard last month, had evaded arrest by hiding behind an upstairs wall of a wooden cabin, with suitcases of cash at hand, prosecutors said on Wednesday.

headline.main: South Korea Ferry Fugitive Hid Behind Cabin Wall, Bags of Cash at Hand
headline.print_headline: South Korea Ferry Fugitive Hid Behind Cabin Wall, Bags of Cash at Hand

docs.snippet: Why does a dictator with nukes freak out about a James Franco sendup? Because he's into movies. Really.
docs.lead_paragraph: Why does a dictator with nukes freak out about a James Franco sendup? Because he's into movies. Really.

docs.snippet: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea vowed to disband her country’s coast guard, and the commissioner general, Kim Suk-Kyoon, responded to her decision.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea vowed to disband her country’s coast guard, and the commissioner general, Kim Suk-Kyoon, responded to her decision.

docs.snippet: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea vowed to dismantle her country’s coast guard because of its failures in responding to the recent ferry disaster.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea vowed to dismantle her country’s coast guard because of its failures in responding to the recent ferry disaster.

headline.main: South Korea to Disband Coast Guard, Leader Says

docs.snippet: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea vowed on Monday to disband her country’s Coast Guard because of its failures in a ferry disaster.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea vowed on Monday to disband her country’s Coast Guard because of its failures in a ferry disaster.
docs.abstract: South Korean Pres Park Geun-hye vows to disband country’s Coast Guard after its bungled rescue attempts following ferry disaster in April; offers apology for having failed to prevent sinking of ferry; says Coast Guard will be reorganized to deal more efficiently with disasters.

headline.main: South Korea to Disband Coast Guard, Leader Vows
headline.print_headline: South Korea to Disband Coast Guard, Leader Vows

docs.snippet: Donald P. Gregg, a former United States ambassador to South Korea, recall the conductor’s visit to North Korea.
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald P. Gregg, a former United States ambassador to South Korea, recall the conductor’s visit to North Korea.

docs.snippet: China and South Korea on Thursday agreed measures that will expand the use of China's tightly controlled currency and boost trade as Xi Jinping made his first presidential visit to the Korean Peninsula.
docs.lead_paragraph: China and South Korea on Thursday agreed measures that will expand the use of China's tightly controlled currency and boost trade as Xi Jinping made his first presidential visit to the Korean Peninsula.

headline.main: China, South Korea Agree to Boost Economic Ties
headline.print_headline: China, South Korea Agree to Boost Economic Ties

docs.snippet: Pope Francis' choice of wheels during his five-day South Korean visit has surprised many in this painfully self-conscious country, where big shots rarely hit the streets in anything but expensive luxury cars.
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis' choice of wheels during his five-day South Korean visit has surprised many in this painfully self-conscious country, where big shots rarely hit the streets in anything but expensive luxury cars.

headline.main: Pope's Small Car Fascinates South Koreans
headline.print_headline: Pope's Small Car Fascinates South Koreans

docs.snippet: South Korea said on Tuesday it would not accept Japan's exercise of collective self-defense that affects the security of the Korean peninsula without its request or agreement, after Tokyo moved to drop a ban on its military from fighting overseas.
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korea said on Tuesday it would not accept Japan's exercise of collective self-defense that affects the security of the Korean peninsula without its request or agreement, after Tokyo moved to drop a ban on its military from fighting overseas.

headline.main: South Korea Cautions Japan on Easing Military Limits
headline.print_headline: South Korea Cautions Japan on Easing Military Limits
